resources.string:
The players have to take turns in tapping a line. 
 
Once the last line of a box is tapped, the point belongs to the player that placed the last line. 
 
If a player has claimed a box, the same player can place another line. 
 
A player can take one box from the other player by tapping the "take box" button and then selecting the box to claim. 
 
Each game, both players can place one bomb. The bomb can be placed by clicking the "place bomb" button and by then selecting the box to blow up.
